channel.title: Papers on Zoltán Sylvester
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Zoltán Sylvester

item.title: Meandering streamflows across landscapes and scales: a review and discussion
item.description: This introductory chapter reviews the history of research on meandering streams and presents a compilation of data on meander morphology. Published in *Geological Society, London, Special Publications*, 2024.

item.title: Turbidite correlation for paleoseismology
item.description: Published in *GSA Bulletin*, 2024.

item.title: Fluvial-style migration controls autogenic aggradation in submarine channels: Joshua Channel, eastern Gulf of Mexico
item.description: Published in *Geological Society, London, Special Publications, v. 540*, 2024.

item.title: The impact of post-cutoff bend curvature on channel kinematics in meandering rivers: an example from the Trinity River, Texas, USA
item.description: This paper investigates the relationship between post-cutoff bend curvature and channel kinematics in meandering rivers using Trinity River data. Published in *Geological Society, London, Special Publications*, 2024.

item.title: Stratigraphy in space and time: A reproducible approach to analysis and visualization
item.description: Published in *Earth Science Reviews, v. 250, 104206*, 2024.

item.title: Giant meandering channel evolution, Campos deep-water salt basin, Brazil
item.description: This paper analyzes the evolution of giant meandering submarine channels in the Campos Basin, Brazil, and their interaction with salt diapirs. Published in *Geosphere*, 2021.

item.title: Autogenic translation and counter point bar deposition in meandering rivers
item.description: This paper explores the development of counter point bars in meandering rivers through autogenic translation processes. Published in *GSA Bulletin*, 2021.
